instructions: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, cook beef and onion until meat is no longer pink.
Stir in tomatoes, tomato sauce, beans, chili powder, cumin, cayenne and garlic.
Cover, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes.
title: Melanie's Chili
steps: In a large saucepan over medium-high heat, cook beef and onion until meat is no longer pink. Stir in tomatoes, tomato sauce, beans, chili powder, cumin, cayenne and garlic. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes.
